phrase: Lo que tenemos que hacer es ir siempre hacia el futuro; cuando el mundo cambia a tu alrededor y cuando cambia en tu contra, tienes que apoyarte en eso y descubrir qué hacer, porque quejarse no es una estrategia.
author: Jeff Bezos

phrase: Los patrones de movimiento de precios no son aleatorios. Sin embargo, están lo suficientemente cerca del azar.
author: Jim Simons

phrase: La manera de volverse un buen líder es buscar lo mejor en las personas. Rara vez criticar, siempre alabar.
author: Richard Branson

phrase: Si no estás fallando, no estás superando tus límites, y si no estás superando tus límites, no estás maximizando tu potencial.
author: Ray Dalio

phrase: Sé ambicioso cuando los demás tengan miedo y ten miedo cuando los demás sean ambiciosos.
author: Warren Buffett

phrase: You don't have to be faster than the bear, you just have to be faster than the slowest guy who runs from it.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: Don't take life too seriously. You won't get out of it alive.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: Tomorrow may be too late to enjoy what you have today.
author: ajescudero

phrase: When looking for what you want most, remember to do your best.
author: ajescudero

phrase: Don't forget that a friend is a gift you give yourself.
author: ajescudero

phrase: Rejoice, a path of beautiful passions awaits you and you must walk it.
author: ajescudero

phrase: A reputation of a thousand years may depend on the conduct of an hour
author: Japanese Proverb

phrase: Feel the happiness waiting for you and don't forget to catch it to keep it with you.
author: ajescudero

phrase: Rejoice, a path of beautiful passions awaits you and you must walk it
author: ajescudero

phrase: Not everyone can receive the same things. It was practiced.
author: ajescudero
